verbs.description: [V: remedi] first mls goal clinches atlanta united victory over nycfc eric remedi scored his first mls goal in the 37th minute and atlanta united beat new york fc 1 - 0 on sunday in the first leg of the eastern conference semifinals remedi eric remedi miguel almiron josef martínez sean johnson sean johnson soccer new york fc greg garza atlanta
